com.cyberneid.disigon.sdk

Class DisigonSigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberneid.disigon.sdk.DisigonSigner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    P11Signer, P12Signer

    public abstract class DisigonSigner
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for digital signature (qualified, FEA, etc.) with CAdES and/or PKCS#7 format
    Author:
    Ugo Chirico

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DisigonSigner()
      Initializes a new instance of the DigitalSignature class.

      • sign

        public P7MDocument sign(byte[] data,
                        CertSelector selector)
                 throws SignatureException
        Signs the specified data and add a time stamp taken from the given TSA Client
        Parameters:
        data - the data
        selector - the certificate selector
        Returns:
        signature in PKCS# format DER encoded
        Throws:
        SignatureException

      • sign

        public P7MDocument sign(byte[] data,
                        CertSelector selector,
                        boolean cades,
                        boolean detached,
                        boolean multisignature)
                 throws SignatureException
        Signs the specified data and add a time stamp taken from the given TSA Client
        Parameters:
        data - the data
        selector - the certificate selector
        cades - specifies if CAdES signature is needed
        detached - specifies if the signature must be detached
        multisignature - specifies if multisignature
        Returns:
        signature in PKCS#7 or CAdES format DER encoded
        Throws:
        SignatureException
        See Also:
        QualifiedCertSelector}, {@link SimpleCertSelector}

        public P7MDocument sign(byte[] data,

                        boolean detached,
                        boolean multisignature,
                        TSAClient tsaClient)
                 throws SignatureException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Signs the specified data and add a time stamp taken from the given TSA Client
        Parameters:
        data - the data
        certificate - the signer's certificate
        cades - specifies if CAdES signature is needed
        detached - specifies if the signature must be detached
        multisignature - specifies if multisignature
        tsaClient - the TSA client
        Returns:
        signature in PKCS#7 or CAdES format DER encoded
        Throws:
        SignatureException

                               boolean detached,
                               TSAClient tsaClient)
                        throws SignatureException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Signs the specified data and add a time stamp taken from the given TSA Client
        Parameters:
        sigDoc - the signed document to countersign
        signerInfoToSign - signerInfo to countersign
        selector - the certificate selector
        cades - specifies if CAdES signature is needed
        detached - specifies if the signature must be detached
        tsaClient - the TSA client
        Returns:
        signature in PKCS#7 or CAdES format DER encoded
        Throws:
        SignatureException
        org.spongycastle.tsp.TSPException

      • countersign

        public P7MDocument countersign(P7MDocument sigDoc,
                               com.cyberneid.disigon.sdk.SignerInfo signerInfoToSign,
                               org.spongycastle.cert.X509CertificateHolder certificate,
                               boolean cades,
                               boolean detached,
                               TSAClient tsaClient)
                        throws SignatureException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Signs the specified data and add a time stamp taken from the given TSA Client
        Parameters:
        sigDoc - the signed document to countersign
        signerInfoToSign - signerInfo to countersign
        certificate - the signer's certificate
        cades - specifies if CAdES signature is needed
        detached - specifies if the signature must be detached
        tsaClient - the TSA client
        Returns:
        signature in PKCS#7 or CAdES format DER encoded
        Throws:
        SignatureException
